description:
Pletweri was a Phezzani diplomat who served as the dominion`s high commissioner posted on Heinessen, reponsible for lobbying and outright bribery. The merchant ship captain http://anidb.net/ch269 [Boris Konev] served as his secretary for some time. He was seen packing up documents at the High Commission after Phezzan was occupied by the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire], but what happened to him afterwards is unknown.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Pletweri
